attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dear prime minister please listen this is a serious matter i do strongly believe we should legalize cannibis it can help alot of people with certain problems and it is only class C so basiclly nearly legalized any way 
there are much worse drugs for us and i will do everythin untill it is legalized ppl are just going on to worse drugs like LSD'S AND HEROIN plz just let me do this potiton i strongly believe in this and would like to see how many ppl out there feel the same

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
